title: Lost my store bought summoner icon
body: It was the soccerball one. Gone.  It got replaced by the siege minion icon. And there is just a blank space where it used to be

replies.body:
Hey,

If there's a blank space showing where an icon should be - it might be worth going through and [repairing your client](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues#wq6).  If the icon still doesn't show up after that, I'd suggest you send in a support ticket.

Cheers
Mindstar

Thanks for the reply!
But its ok now :) Turns out it happens every time the client patches. Comes back as soon as its done tho
